BULLETIN NO. 153 
Water Barrier Filtration UPDATED LIST 
16 August 2024 
THIS BULLETIN IS ADDRESSED TO ALL MEMBERS WITH INTO-PLANE OPERATIONS USING 
WATER BARRIER FILTERS. 
IT UPDATES THE LIST OF AVAILABLE WBF TECHNOLOGIES IN JIG STANDARDS.
BACKGROUND: 
In April 2023, following the conclusion of JIG field trials, the Parker Velcon Water Barrier Filter (model number CDFX
- 2XXB) was introduced into JIG Standards by Bulletin 147.
UPDATED LIST OF QUALIFIED WATER BARRIER FILTRATION 
The updated list of the Water Barrier Filters qualified to EI 1588 2nd Edition, available for use on into-plane fuelling 
equipment only, is the following: 
MANUFACTURER 
Qualification and Model Number 
Parker Velcon 
Water Barrier Element 2" 
Qualified to EI 1588 2nd Edition 
Model No: CDFX - 2XXB 
Facet Filtration Group 
Water Barrier Element 2" 
Qualified to EI 1588 2nd Edition 
Model No: FWB - 2XX 
All relevant information about WBF technology can be found in JIG Bulletin 147. This includes Management of Change 
and Operational requirements for this new technology introduced in JIG Standards in April 2023. 
THIS BULLETIN IS INFORMATIVE OF NEW WBF ELEMENTS AVAILABLE UNDER EI 1588 2nd EDITION QUALIFICATION.
If you have any questions about this Bulletin, please email

oduced in JIG Standards in April 2023.
